last_episode_to_air.name: Chapter 6
last_episode_to_air.overview: An unexpected visit forces Gala to make the most important decision of her life.

name: Land of Women
overview: Gala is a New York City socialite on the run in a quaint Spanish town with her mother and daughter. Gala's new life brings her into the path of a brash but charming winery owner—and a deep well of family secrets.
tagline: The perfect place to make your escape.

episodes.name: Chapter 1
episodes.overview: When a betrayal comes to light, Gala whisks Julia and Kate off to Spain for a girls trip—only for Julia and Kate to discover they're actually all on the run.

episodes.name: Chapter 2
episodes.overview: Amat complicates Gala's plans to lay low. Kate tries to return home, unaware of the danger she's in. Julia confesses the truth about Gala's father.

episodes.name: Chapter 3
episodes.overview: Gala dives into making the winery successful. Meanwhile, Julia resorts to blackmail, further straining her relationship with Mariona.

episodes.name: Chapter 4
episodes.overview: Hank and Kevin close in on Gala's whereabouts just as she makes a troubling discovery about the extent of Fred's misdeeds.

episodes.name: Chapter 5
episodes.overview: Amat senses something's up with Gala and uncovers her connection to Hank and Kevin. Chaos erupts at the winery.

episodes.name: Chapter 6
episodes.overview: An unexpected visit forces Gala to make the most important decision of her life.
